columns.user_id: The unique identifier of the user who performed the search.
columns.search_seq: The sequential number of the user's search entries.
columns.search_datetime: The date and time when the search was conducted.
columns.search_string: The keywords or phrases used in the search query.

User_Searches.table_description: The table records user search activities for real estate rentals.

columns.age_category_code: The unique code identifying each age category.
columns.age_category_description: The textual description of the age category.

Ref_Age_Categories.table_description: The table categorizes users based on their age ranges.

columns.property_type_code: The unique code identifying each property type.
columns.property_type_description: The textual description of the property type.

Ref_Property_Types.table_description: The table defines various types of properties for rental listings.

columns.room_type_code: The unique code identifying each room type.
columns.room_type_description: The textual description of the room type.

Ref_Room_Types.table_description: The table defines various room types available in properties.

columns.user_category_code: The unique code identifying each user category.
columns.user_category_description: The textual description of the user category.

Ref_User_Categories.table_description: The table classifies users into specific categories for rental services.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier of the property in the history record.
columns.user_id: The unique identifier of the user associated with the property.
columns.datestamp: The date and time when the property was accessed by the user.

User_Property_History.table_description: The table tracks user interactions with properties over time.

columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address record.
columns.line_1_number_building: The primary address line including the building number.
columns.line_2_number_street: The secondary address line, often with an apartment or suite number.
columns.line_3_area_locality: The optional area or locality descriptor for the address.
columns.town_city: The city or town where the address is located.
columns.zip_postcode: The postal code associated with the address.
columns.county_state_province: The county, state, or province where the address is situated.
columns.country: The country in which the address is found.
columns.other_address_details: Additional details regarding the address, if any.

Addresses.table_description: The table stores address information for properties in real estate rentals.

columns.feature_id: The unique identifier for each feature in the database.
columns.feature_name: The name of the property feature being described.
columns.feature_description: A brief explanation of the property feature.

Features.table_description: The table catalogs various features available in rental properties.

columns.user_id: The unique identifier for each user in the system.
columns.age_category_code: The age category to which the user belongs.
columns.user_category_code: The specific category in which the user is classified.
columns.user_address_id: The identifier linking to the user's address information.
columns.is_buyer: The indicator showing if the user is a buyer.
columns.is_seller: The indicator showing if the user is a seller.
columns.login_name: The unique login name for user authentication.
columns.password: The hashed password for user security.
columns.date_registered: The date and time when the user registered.
columns.first_name: The first name of the user.
columns.middle_name: The middle name of the user.
columns.last_name: The last name of the user.
columns.other_user_details: Additional details about the user, if available.

Users.table_description: The table stores user information for real estate rentals.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier for each property listing.
columns.property_address_id: The address identifier linked to this property.
columns.owner_user_id: The identifier of the user who owns the property.
columns.property_type_code: The code representing the type of the property.
columns.date_on_market: The date when the property was listed for rent.
columns.date_off_market: The date when the property was removed from the market.
columns.property_name: The name or title of the property.
columns.property_description: A detailed description of the property's features.
columns.garage_yn: The indicator showing if a garage is available.
columns.parking_lots: The number of parking lots associated with the property.
columns.room_count: The total number of rooms in the property.
columns.vendor_requested_price: The price requested by the owner to rent the property.
columns.price_min: The minimum rental price set for the property.
columns.price_max: The maximum rental price set for the property.
columns.other_property_details: Any additional details regarding the property.

Properties.table_description: The table details property listings available for rental in real estate.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier of the property associated with the feature.
columns.feature_id: The unique identifier of the feature linked to the property.
columns.feature_value: The specific value assigned to the property feature.
columns.property_feature_description: The description of the particular property feature.

Property_Features.table_description: The table links properties with their unique features in real estate rentals.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier of the property for which the photo is taken.
columns.photo_seq: The sequential number assigned to each photo of the property.
columns.photo_title: The title or label identifying the specific photo.
columns.photo_description: The description providing details about the photo.
columns.photo_filename: The filename of the photo stored in the database.

Property_Photos.table_description: The table stores photos related to properties available for rent.

columns.property_id: The unique identifier of the property containing the room.
columns.room_number: The specific number assigned to each room in the property.
columns.room_type_code: The code representing the type of room in the property.
columns.room_size: The size category of the room, such as small or large.
columns.other_room_details: Additional information or details about the room.

Rooms.table_description: The table captures room details associated with rental properties.
